verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: pushed] [ARG2: back] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] [ARG1: against criticism that his decision to hold face - to - face talks with North Korea ’s leader amounted to a major concession to Pyongyang , with no gain for Washington in return] .

[ARG0: President Trump] pushed back Sunday against criticism that his decision to [V: hold] [ARG1: face - to - face talks] [ARG2: with North Korea ’s leader] amounted to a major concession to Pyongyang , with no gain for Washington in return .

President Trump pushed back Sunday against criticism that [ARG1: his decision to hold face - to - face talks with North Korea ’s leader] [V: amounted] [ARG2: to a major concession to Pyongyang] , [ARGM-ADV: with no gain for Washington in return] .
